#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# sample query for gauge_float
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Query:
------
SELECT mean("value"), percentile("value", 99) AS "percentile_99" FROM "mc_gauge_float_data" 
  WHERE "id"='f4863926-1d92-41d3-a91b-f48b03cdd1b0' AND time >= now()-1h AND time <= now() GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

Response:
----------
{
  "results":[
    {
      "statement_id":0,
      "series":[
        {
          "name":"mc_gauge_float_data",
          "columns":["time","mean","percentile_99"],
          "values":[
            [1616557920000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616557980000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558040000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616558100000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558160000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558220000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616558280000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558340000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558400000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616558460000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558520000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558580000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616558640000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558700000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558760000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616558820000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558880000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616558940000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559000000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559060000000000,72.175,72.7],[1616559120000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559180000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559240000000000,72.35,72.7],[1616559300000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559360000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559420000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559480000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559540000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559600000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559660000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559720000000000,72.35,72.7],[1616559780000000000,72.52499999999999,72.7],[1616559840000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616559900000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616559960000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616560020000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616560080000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616560140000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616560200000000000,72.7,72.7],
            [1616560260000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616560320000000000,72.7,72.7],[1616560380000000000,72.7,72.7],

          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# sample query for binary
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Query:
------
SELECT "value" FROM "mc_binary_data" WHERE "id"='f6002c99-39bf-4041-946b-4f63086c2340' AND time >= now()-48h AND time <= now()

Response:
---------
{
  "results":[
    {
      "statement_id":0,
      "series":[
        {
          "name":"mc_binary_data",
          "columns":["time","value"],
          "values":[
            [1616521639375766767,false],[1616544001399442537,true],[1616544204773483106,false]
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
